name: Real-Time Product Search
description: Extremely Fast and Simple API for searching product offers and reviews across multiple major sources. With just one API, users can access comprehensive and real-time product information, simplifying the search process and improving efficiency.

api_methods.name: Search
api_methods.description: Search for product offers - both free-form queries and GTIN/EAN are supported. Each page contains up to 30 product offers. Infinite pagination/scrolling is supported using the *page* parameter.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Free-form search query or a GTIN/EAN (e.g. *0194252014233*).

parameters.name: min_rating
parameters.description:
Return products with rating greater than the specified value.
Possible values: `1`, `2`, `3`, `4`.

parameters.name: product_condition
parameters.description:
Only return products with a specific condition.
Possible values: `NEW`, `USED`, `REFURBISHED`.

parameters.name: max_shipping_days
parameters.description: Only return product offers that offer shipping/delivery of up to specific number of days (i.e. shipping speed).

parameters.name: store_id
parameters.description:
Only return product offers from specific stores (comma separated list of store id's). Store IDs can be obtained from the Google Shopping URL after using the **Seller** filter by taking the part after the `merchagg:` variable within the `tbs` parameter.

When filtering for a certain Seller / Store on Google Shopping, a URL similar to the following is shown on the address bar: `https://www.google.com/search?gl=us&tbm=shop&q=shoes&tbs=mr:1,merchagg:m100456214|m114373355`, in that case, the Store IDs are **m100456214** and **m114373355** - to filter for these stores, set store_id=m100456214,m114373355.

parameters.name: on_sale
parameters.description:
Only return product offers that are currently on sale.
Default: `false`.

parameters.name: free_returns
parameters.description:
Only return product offers that offer free returns.
Default: `false`.

parameters.name: free_shipping
parameters.description:
Only return product offers that offer free shipping/delivery.
Default: `false`.

parameters.name: max_price
parameters.description: Only return product offers with price lower than a certain value.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description:
The language of the results.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes
Default: `en`.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description:
Sort product offers by best match, top rated, lowest or highest price.
Possible values: `BEST_MATCH`, `TOP_RATED`, `LOWEST_PRICE`, `HIGHEST_PRICE`.
Default: `BEST_MATCH`.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description:
Country code of the region/country to return offers for.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2
Default: `us`.

parameters.name: min_price
parameters.description: Only return product offers with price greater than a certain value.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description:
Results page to return.
Default: `1`.

utterances.utterance: Find me the best deals on wireless headphones with a rating of at least 4 stars.
Show me new laptops available in Germany with free shipping.
Search for refurbished smartphones under $300 that offer free returns.
Can you find me running shoes from specific stores with a maximum shipping time of 3 days?
I'm looking for coffee machines on sale in France, sorted by lowest price.
Find me the top-rated blenders with a minimum price of $50.
Show me used cameras available in Canada with free shipping and free returns.
Search for gaming chairs with a maximum price of $200 and a rating of at least 3 stars.
Find me the best match for smartwatches in Spanish.
Show me the highest-priced designer handbags available in Italy.

api_methods.name: Product Offers
api_methods.description: Get all offers available for a product.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: Product id of the product for which to fetch offers.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description:
Country code of the region/country to return offers for.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2
Default: `us`.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description:
The language of the results.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes
Default: `en`.

utterances.utterance: Show me the offers for the iPhone 13 Pro Max.
What are the available deals for the Sony WH-1000XM4 in Canada?
Can you find the best prices for the Samsung Galaxy S21 in French?
I need to see the offers for the MacBook Air M1 in Germany.
Find the latest deals for the Bose QuietComfort 45 in Spanish.
What are the current offers for the Google Pixel 6 in the UK?
Show me the best prices for the Dell XPS 13 in Italian.
Can you find the offers for the Apple Watch Series 7 in Japan?
I want to see the deals for the LG OLED C1 in Portuguese.
What are the available offers for the Microsoft Surface Laptop 4 in Australia?

api_methods.name: Product Reviews
api_methods.description: Get all product reviews. Infinite pagination/scrolling is supported using the *limit* and *offset* parameters.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: Product id of the product for which to fetch reviews.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description:
Country code of the region/country.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2
Default: `us`.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description:
The language of the results.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes
Default: `en`.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description:
Number of reviews to skip.
Valid values: integers from 0-30000
Default: `0`.

parameters.name: rating
parameters.description:
Only return reviews with user rating greater than the specified value.
Valid values: 1-5.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
Maximum number of product reviews to return.
Valid values: integers from 0-100.
Default: `10`.

utterances.utterance: Can you show me reviews for the iPhone 13 Pro Max?
What are the reviews for the Sony WH-1000XM4 headphones in Japan?
Find reviews for the Samsung Galaxy S21 in French.
Show me reviews with a rating above 4 for the MacBook Air M1.
Get reviews for the Canon EOS R5 in Germany.
What are the reviews for the Bose QuietComfort 45 in Spanish?
Find reviews with a rating above 3 for the Google Pixel 6 in Canada.
Show me reviews for the LG OLED C1 TV in Italian.
What are the reviews for the Dyson V11 vacuum cleaner in the UK?
Find reviews with a rating above 2 for the Amazon Echo Dot in French.

api_methods.name: Product Details
api_methods.description: Get the details of a specific product by product id. Returns the full product details in addition to reviews sample, photos, product specs and more information.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: Product id of the product for which to get full details.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description:
Country code of the region/country to return offers for.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2
Default: `us`.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description:
The language of the results.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes
Default: `en`.

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the details for the iPhone 13 Pro Max?
I need the full details for the Sony WH-1000XM4 headphones in Canada.
What are the specifications for the Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra in French?
Please provide the product details for the Dyson V11 vacuum cleaner in Germany.
Can you give me the reviews and photos for the Apple Watch Series 7 in Spanish?
I want to see the full details for the Bose QuietComfort 45 headphones in the UK.
What are the product specs for the Canon EOS R5 in Japanese?
Show me the details for the LG OLED C1 TV in Australia.
Can you provide the product information for the Microsoft Surface Laptop 4 in German?
